articles.description: “This is exactly why we can’t let our guard down now, even if it feels ‘safe’ to be at the beach.”
articles.content: Pennsylvania health officials are urging caution after beach house parties on the Jersey Shore translated to 12 new coronavirus infections in Bucks County over the past two weeks. It appears that the… [+2121 chars]
